ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinister kisses Blizzard. Sinesis turns his head and stares at Twister. Yeah, I guess your right. He said to her. I guess we go wherever the wind takes us.

Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Sinister kisses Blizzard. Sinesis turns his head and stares at Twister.

"Y=
eah, I guess your right." He said to her.

"I guess we go wherever the wind=
 takes us." Airbomber said.

"I just hope that we can survive in a trio." S=
tranato said...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 8:43 PM
  Subject: =
Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Blizzard smiles*

  Blizzard: Maybe I can make it b=
etter...

  *Blizzard moves closer to Sinister ready to lock a kiss with hi=
m*

  *Twister starts letting out a low growl. She didn't want to make Bliz=
zard mad and lose her as friend. She knows they will always be sisters but =
she wanted them to be friends but she was afraid that if Blizzard gets more=
 involved with Sinister than she might be forgoten about and left behind. S=
he sits there and tries to ignore Blizzard's action and turns back to Sines=
is*

  Twister: I think you should get to a CR Chamber but thats only my su=
ggestion...

  *Twister says with her optics blinking quickly trying to ign=
ore Blizzard and Sinister*




  *Infectra nods to Stranato and smiles when=
 Airbomber wraps his arms around her*

  Infectra: Do we have anywhere to g=
o, anywhere?

  *Infectra asks Airbomber with sadness in her optics*
    --=
--- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
    Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 7:30 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

=

    Sinesis and Sinister both smile. Dracona frowns, nobody ever liked her=
, Plintissa even used her, but no more of that now, she was her own agent. =
But what Dracona didn't want Sinesis and Sinister to know, is that she had =
escaped from their programming and had been doing this stuff on her own. Dr=
acona walked around the Radicons and up to Sinesis and Sinister.

    "I'm =
fine, Blizzard, but I hurt right here." Sinister said, he touched his lips.=


    "How can you be fine? That damn 3D and stuff almost killed us! Person=
ally, I ache all over!" Sinesis said.

    "Yeah, I know." Sinister said. H=
e winked to Sinesis. Train Wreck turned to Dracona.

    "I never felt so g=
ood, I feel like I can lock on a Rings of Saturn and break someones arm bey=
ond repair!" Train Wreck said.

    "Good." Dracona simply replied.

    St=
ranato and Airbomber look at each other, they were worried.

    "Watch you=
r back, Infectra, remember my training tips." Stranato said. Airbomber wrap=
ped his arms around Infectra, at all costs he would certainly give his life=
 to protect her...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: iloveall=
lizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000=
 8:23 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra runs after Air=
bomber and Stranato*


      *Blizzard and Twister stand there watching the=
 three run away*

      Blizzard: Yeah, we're with you.

      *Twister nod=
s*

      *Blizzard walks up to Sinister*

      Blizzard: Are you okay?

 =
     *Twister walks up to Sinesis*

      Twister: Are your damages bad?
  =
      ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwr=
pg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2000 7:45 PM
        Subj=
ect: Neo Beast Wars


        Deemos and Inzola walk up to Lunarpine and Ra=
mulus.

        "Hello?" Deemos asked, he was getting mad.

        Gangon'=
s spark is almost DEAD, his spark was trying to join with the Matrix.

    =
    Plintissa gets up and Airbomber jumps next to her. Dracona fires an ice=
 beam. Airbomber jumps out of the way and his arm is frozen as he pushes Pl=
intissa out of the way. Dracona laughs. But suddenly.

        Dracona: Wha=
t the?

        Dracona is grabbed and listed up, and gets the Dudley Death=
 Drop from Stronghold and Blender. Blender does the Diamond Cutter sign.

 =
       Blender: Bang!

        "Nothing like a good beating, as long as you=
r not the one recieving it." Stronghold said. Sinesis and Sinister fired be=
ams that blasted Blender and Stronghold from behind. They suddenly had trou=
ble moving. Sinesis and Sinister stood up smiling.

        "Take a licking=
 and keep on ticking!" Sinister said. The device they were holding was a re=
programing device. Stronghold and Blender stared mindlessly. Stranato looke=
d on in shock. Dracona stands up and slaps Blender. He wakes up. She slaps =
Stronghold and wakes him up. Blender turns and Train Wreck is running by. B=
lender trips him up! Train Wreck is kicked in the ribs by Dracona. Sinesis =
and Sinister fired at him with the reprogramming beam. Train Wreck stares, =
looking more evil than before. Arrow is grabbed and whipped by Stronghold, =
right into Blender's clotheline. Sinesis and Sinister fire the beam and hit=
 Arrow as well. Arrow suddenly turns on Airbomber, firing at him. Airbomber=
 moves out of the way as a beam hits the spot. Suddenly, the device explode=
s and blows off Sinesis' arm. Plintissa is holding a smoking blaster. Plint=
issa and Artist run as Sinesis fires furiously with his other arm. Plintiss=
a and Artist escape. Airbomber is helped up by Stranato.

        "Infectra=
, run!" Airbomber said. Stranato and Airbomber run, leaving their former Ra=
dicon teammates behind. Train Wreck, Sinesis, Sinister, Arrow, Stronghold, =
and Blender stand next to their leader, Dracona.

        "Our device was d=
estroyed!" Sinister said.

        "No matter, we'll get those 5." Dracona =
said.

        Sinesis pokes at where his arm was.

        "Blizzard, Twis=
ter, you with us?" Dracona asked.

        Stranato and Airbomber flee into=
 the woods.

        Plintissa and Artist run over a hill.

        Dracona=
 contacts Zardus.

        "Zardus, this is anonymous bot looking for a goo=
d side, are you interested in a good team of 9 bots?" Dracona asks...

----=
------------------------------------------------------------------------


=

--------------------------------------------------------------------------=
--
